intro.learnMore: Click on a topic to see details. Learn more about .__lastAppTitle__ in our demo-cardset…

carousel-inner.carousel-paragraph-0: Create an learn your own digital flashcards.
carousel-inner.carousel-paragraph-1: Finally, an easy way to learn bulky mathematical formulas.
carousel-inner.carousel-paragraph-2: Learn program code easier - thanks to an automatic syntax highlighting.

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.heading: Tasks are waiting for you!
notifications.warning: Missing the deadline will reset your learning-progress.

upload-form.popover-content: Here you can upload your own cards to the cardset. Currently the formats JSON and CSV (Excel, comma-separated) are supported. Please have a look at these templates:

confirm-form.title: Delete card
confirm-form.text: Do you really want to delete this card?

confirm-form-learn.title: Leave cardset
confirm-form-learn.text: Do you really want to leave this cardset? If you accept this process, you lose your entire learning progress.

confirm-enter-learnphase.title: Join active learnphase
confirm-enter-learnphase.text: You allow the lecturer of this cardset following access to your data:
confirm-enter-learnphase.text2: This information will be only used to score your progress.

confirm-leave-learnphase.title: Leave the active Learning-Phase
confirm-leave-learnphase.text: Do you really want to leave this active Learning-Phase? If you accept this, then your entire learning progress will be deleted.

confirm-leave-cardset.title: Leave the Cardset
confirm-leave-cardset.text: Do you really want to leave this Cardset? If you accept this, then your entire learning progress will be deleted.

confirm-leave-editors.title: Leave Editor Group
confirm-leave-editors.text: Do you want to remove your editor privilege for the cardset "__name__"?

complete-profile.title: User profile incomplete
complete-profile.text: Your user profile is incomplete. Please enter your first, last name and email in order to use a learning mode.

confirm-form-profile.title: Delete user profile
confirm-form-profile.text: If you do not think you will use .__lastAppTitle__ again, you can delete here your user profile. Keep in mind that you will not be able to reactivate your user profile or retrieve any of the content or information you have added. By deleting your user profile all personal data and private cardsets will be deleted. Published content remain in .__lastAppTitle__, so other users of the system can use them.
confirm-form-profile.text2: If you would still like to delete your user profile, please click the button "Delete user profile". After the process you will be automatically logged out of .__lastAppTitle__.

confirmLearn-form.title: Start Learning-Phase
confirmLearn-form.text: Do you really want to start the Learn-Phase? All users of this deck will lose their progress!
confirmLearn-form.maxCardsDesc: Maximum number of daily learnable cards
confirmLearn-form.wrongOrder: The intervals are set in the wrong order! They will be sorted automatically.
confirmLearn-form.notificationError: Please choose at least one way of notification!

confirmEndLearn-form.title: Stop Learn-Phase
confirmEndLearn-form.warnTitle: You are about to stop the Learn-Phase!
confirmEndLearn-form.warning: If you continue, the Learn-Phase will be stopped. After that, you won't be able to get any results anymore! Do you really wish to continue?

modal-dialog.descriptionplaceholder: Description for the content of this cardset
modal-dialog.by-desc: Licensees may copy, distribute, display and perform the work and make derivative works and remixes based on it only if they give the author or licensor the credits (attribution) in the manner specified by these.
modal-dialog.nc-desc: Licensees may copy, distribute, display, and perform the work and make derivative works and remixes based on it only for non-commercial purposes.
modal-dialog.nd-desc: Licensees may copy, distribute, display and perform only verbatim copies of the work, not derivative works and remixes based on it.
modal-dialog.sa-desc: Licensees may distribute derivative works only under a license identical ("not more restrictive") to the license that governs the original work.
modal-dialog.zero-desc: No license has been set for this cardset.
modal-dialog.resetLeitner: Do you really want to reset your learning progress for the mode "learn by leitner" of the cardset "__name__"?
modal-dialog.resetWozniak: Do you really want to reset your learning progress for the mode "learn by Wozniak" of the cardset "__name__"?

modal-dialog.deleteCard: Do you really want to erase the card?
modal-dialog.cancelEditCard: Do you really want to leave editing mode? All unsaved changes will be discarded upon confirmation.

meteorgame.description: Destroy the meteorites before they reach the earth! Each meteorite is labelled with one page of one of your learn card - destroy it with the correct answer on the back!
meteorgame.warning: Attention! Meteor works best with flashcards, which contain short keywords and concised sentences.
meteorgame.question: Question

learn-endscreen.back: Choose another box or go back to deck of cards.

learning-goal.name: Learning Goal Level
learning-goal.level1Placeholder:
Formulate the requirement "remember" with one of the following verbs: 

retrieve, list, enumerate, name, describe, label, explain, identify, reproduce, reproduce, repeat or know.
learning-goal.level2Placeholder:
Formulate the requirement "understanding" with one of the following verbs: 

derive, abstract, justify, describe, define, discuss, explain, explain, formulate, illustrate, interpret, classify, paraphrase, close, sketch, distinguish, illustrate, clarify or summarize.
learning-goal.level3Placeholder:
Formulate the requirement "Apply" with one of the following verbs: 

justify, perform, develop, handle, implement, solve, use, implement or transfer.
learning-goal.level4Placeholder:
Formulate the requirement "analysing" with one of the following verbs: 

select, classify, classify, research, recognise, develop, highlight, interpret, prove, organise, test, structure, test, distinguish, examine or compare.
learning-goal.level5Placeholder:
Formulate the requirement "evaluate" with one of the following verbs: 

evaluate, evaluate, assess, assess, understand, classify, decide, determine, evaluate, question or check.
learning-goal.level6Placeholder:
Formulate the requirement "creating" with one of the following verbs: 

design, develop, generate, generate, combine, construct, conceive, coordinate, produce, modify, produce, connect, assemble or assemble.

firstLogin.title: Welcome to __firstAppTitle__.__lastAppTitle__ !
firstLogin.message:
Take a look around the platform.
      Here you can learn cards on a specific topic or create sets of cards for your studies.
      </br>
      </br>
      The help above in the middle explains why this platform is so unique !
      </br>
      </br>
      Search the topic pool for a topic that interests you.
      Click on the small arrow to the far right of the topic to see the description of the card index.
      Click on the topic to see the cards.
      </br>
      </br>

empty.text: After lesson plan there are no flashcards to learn at the moment
